spotifyR 2.1.3

Retrieve artist discography with song lyrics and audio info

Source: R/geniusR.R
get_album_data.Rd

Retrieve the entire discography of an artist with the lyrics of each song and the associated audio information. Returns the song data as a nested tibble (see tidyr::nest). This way we can easily see each album, artist, and song title before expanding our data.

get_album_data(
  artist,
  albums = character(),
  authorization = get_spotify_access_token()
)

Arguments

artist

The quoted name of the artist. Spelling matters, capitalization does not.
albums

A character vector of album names. Spelling matters, capitalization does not
authorization

Authorization token for Spotify web API. Defaults to get_spotify_access_token()

Value

A nested tibble. See tidyr::nest.

Examples

# \donttest{
get_album_data(artist = "Wild child",
               albums = "Expectations")
